snippet.title: TWO WEEKS to MAKE an OUTER WILDS GAME!
snippet.description:
Two weeks to finish my Outer Wilds inspired puzzle, adventure game. Was it a bad idea?
Wishlist my new game, HexLands now! ➤ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2244650/HexLands/?utm_source=yt&utm_content=ld50-1
Join our Discord community ➤ https://discord.gg/6hKwSaCkwa
I've got two weeks to finish my Outer Wilds inspired little game... It's Ludum Dare's 20th anniversary and I'm participating in the new "Extra" category! I'm creating a puzzle/adventure game in Unity3D heavily inspired by Outer Wilds and Carl Sagan's Contact.

Subscribe to my mailing list for giveaways, betas and news ➤ https://mailchi.mp/659931c62f88/portgatestudios
https://twitter.com/TudvariOfficial
https://www.facebook.com/PortgateStudios

#gamedev #ldjam #unity3d

0:00 Intro
0:50 Endless Brainstorming
1:29 Deciding on an idea!
2:15 The Core Concept
3:15 Finally starting to work!
3:45 Throwing stuff!
3:59 Rocks, a hidden Door and a Boat!
4:55 I'm a lumberjack and I'm okay!
5:12 Less disgusting assets & Log!
5:28 Still a lot more stuff to do...

Music: bensound.com
